tfwmdsTableProps.name: firstCellIsHeader
tfwmdsTableProps.description: If set to false, first cell in table row will be a td instead of a th. Default value is true

tfwmdsTableProps.name: classes
tfwmdsTableProps.description: Additional classes to add to the table container.

tfwmdsTableProps.name: rows
tfwmdsTableProps.description: Required. Array of table rows and cells. See options for rows below.

arrayOptions.name: contentText
arrayOptions.description: Required. If html is set, this is not required. Text for cells in table rows. If html is provided, the contentText argument will be ignored.

arrayOptions.name: contentHTML
arrayOptions.description: Required. If contentText is set, this is not required. HTML for cells in table rows. If contentHTML is provided, the contentText argument will be ignored

arrayOptions.name: classes
arrayOptions.description: Additional classes to add to the table row cell.

arrayOptions.name: colspan
arrayOptions.description: Specify how many columns a cell extends.

arrayOptions.name: rowspan
arrayOptions.description: Specify how many rows a cell extends.

tfwmdsTableProps.name: head
tfwmdsTableProps.description: Array of table head cells. See options for head below. Will not show if hideHeader is true.

arrayOptions.name: contentText
arrayOptions.description: Required. Text for cells in table head. If contentHTML is provided, the contentText argument will be used for mobile headers.

arrayOptions.name: contentHTML
arrayOptions.description: Required. If contentText is set, this is not required. HTML for cells in table rows. If contentHTML is provided, the contentText argument will be ignored

arrayOptions.name: classes
arrayOptions.description: Additional classes to add to the table row cell.

arrayOptions.name: colspan
arrayOptions.description: Specify how many columns a cell extends.

arrayOptions.name: rowspan
arrayOptions.description: Specify how many rows a cell extends.

tfwmdsTableProps.name: hideHeader
tfwmdsTableProps.description: Determines whether to display a table header row (thead) at the top of the table. Set to false by default.
